title: PDF Editify
description:
PDF Editify transforms complex PDF management into a seamless experience. We are on a goal to make PDF editing fast, easy and accessible for everyone. 

Key features:
Form Filling
E- signatures
Smart OCR for perfect text recognition
Simple annotation tools (add images, text etc)
Permanently redact sensitive information
Create fillable PDF forms
Conduct surveys or collect data and signatures via PDF forms
Collaborative editing for Teams
